title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Basic
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Basic 
Safety Standards for Protection Against Dangers Arising from Medical 
Exposure to Ionising Radiation) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Basic Safety Standards 
for Protection Against Dangers Arising from Medical Exposure to Ionising 
Radiation) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 332 of 2019), the 
European Union (Basic Safety Standards for Protection Against Dangers 
Arising from Medical Exposure to Ionising Radiation) (Amendment) (No. 2) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 413 of 2019) and these Regulations may be cited 
together as the European Union (Basic Safety Standards for Protection Against 
Dangers Arising from Medical Exposure to Ionising Radiation) Regulations 
2018 to 2022.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Basic Safety Standards for 
Protection Against Dangers Arising from Medical Exposure to Ionising 
Radiation) Regulations 2018 so that the Health Information and Quality 
Authority is now responsible for developing national procedures for clinical 
audits. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Basic Safety 
Standards for Protection Against Dangers Arising from Medical Exposure to 
Ionising Radiation) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [528]
